page.title: 12INDOOR LEISURE WORKINGTON
page.content: In Workington the population is well catered for in the field of indoor leisure.There is a{sports centre and {swimming baths.}The sports centre was opened by olympic medalist{Mary Peters {in October 1978.}The centre provides facilities for badminton , basketball ,gymnastics and netball,there are also table-tennis tables.By the sides of the main hall they have an area for spectators,a snack bar and drink machines.The centre has four squash courts.In three of the courts play can be seen from above but in court one at the back of it there is spectator facilities incorporating a glass back wall.The centre has facilities for indoor bowls , judo and cricket nets also an exercise room consisting of exercise bikes , running machines etc.
